str2: (a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From chora; to place room between, i.e. Part; reflexively, to go away.
Athens, the intellectual capital of Greece. Plural of Athene; Athenoe, the capitol of Greece.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular

str2: A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
